description: Lists the Amazon Q Business data source connectors that you have created.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application linked to the data source connectors.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index used with one or more data source connectors.

nested_items.name: dataSources
nested_items.description: An array of summary information for one or more data source connector.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Q Business data source.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business data source.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the Amazon Q Business data source.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business data source was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business data source was last updated.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Amazon Q Business data source.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Q Business returns this token. You can use this token in a subsequent request to retrieve the next set of data source connectors.
